National Science Council of Cayton (Amendment) Act, No. 44 of 1968 Le, D.—0, 96/69. Aw Act To aMenp THE NatrowaL Scignce Councit oF Cryion Act, No. 9 or 1968. {Date of Assent: December 14, 1968]
BE it enacted by the Queen’s Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate and
‘House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present. Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows:—
4. This Act may be cited as the National Science shor: titte, Council of Ceylon (Amendment) Act, No. 44 of 1968.

2, Section 18 of the National Science Council of Amendment of Ceylon Act, No. 9 of 1968, is hereby amended, by the $i¥e 18 cf substitution, for sub-section (1) of that section, of the a following new sub-section :—

‘* (1) The Council shall, in consultation with the Minister, appoint @ person to be Secretary- General who shall be the chief executive officer of the Council, and who shall be a whole-time officer of the Council. The Secretary-General shall be employed on such terms and conditions as shall be determined by the Minister in consultation with the Minister of Finance.”’.
